MonsterDash 2025

An amazing evening of fun and fitness!

Registration Opens Soon

arrow_downward

Students lining up at the start of the race!

Get Up and Move!

This year, we are inviting our local community to participate in-person in our annual Monster Dash 5K. This isn’t a competitive challenge or race, it’s collaborative. We are all getting our miles in at our own pace, but we’re in this together. Some are chasing their PRs, and others who are taking a leisurely evening walk at sunset around our course.


All registered runners and walkers will receive a beautiful custom-designed race t-shirt. Sign up to run with us, grab your family and friends, and get out and get MOVING!
